title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the requirements for the NanoFactoryController system, including the types of molecular manufacturing processes to be controlled, the desired level of precision, and any other relevant constraints or specifications.

title: Design System Architecture for NanoFactoryController
description: Design the overall architecture of the NanoFactoryController system, including the various components, their interactions, and the communication protocols between them. The architecture should consider scalability, fault tolerance, security, and performance requirements. Ensure that the design follows industry best practices, adheres to relevant standards, and includes a clear documentation for each component's role and responsibilities. Since this task involves critical system-level decisions, it is highly recommended to include a detailed analysis of potential trade-offs and their impact on the system's performance and scalability. The design should also provide an outline for the implementation plan.

title: Develop Control Algorithms
description: Develop the algorithms and logic for controlling the molecular manufacturing processes with the required precision and accuracy.

title: Design User Interface (Revised)
description: Design the user interface for the NanoFactoryController system, ensuring it is intuitive, responsive, and adheres to best practices for user experience (UX) design. The UI should cater to different user roles and access levels, integrate seamlessly with other system components, and provide monitoring and control capabilities for molecular manufacturing processes. Also, consider the need for real-time feedback mechanisms, data visualization tools, and error handling features.

title: Implement Security Measures for NanoFactoryController System
description: Implement robust security measures to ensure the integrity and confidentiality of the NanoFactoryController system. This includes access controls, data encryption, secure communication protocols, and threat detection mechanisms. Collaborate with relevant team members throughout the implementation process.

title: Set up Development and Testing Environment
description: Set up the development and testing environment for the NanoFactoryController system, including the necessary hardware, software, and tools.

title: Develop Comprehensive Testing Framework (Revised)
description: Develop a robust testing framework for the NanoFactoryController system. The revised framework will include unit tests, integration tests, and system tests focusing on edge cases, error handling, performance optimizations, and security aspects. Ensure test coverage of all critical functionalities while considering best practices in test-driven development (TDD). Update the test framework to allow for easy maintenance, scalability, and extensibility.
dependencies: Set up Development and Testing Environment

title: Implement System Components
description: Implement the various components of the NanoFactoryController system, including the control algorithms, user interface, and security measures.

title: Conduct System Testing
description: Conduct thorough testing of the NanoFactoryController system, using the developed testing framework, to ensure its proper functioning and compliance with the requirements.

title: Prepare Documentation
description: Prepare comprehensive documentation for the NanoFactoryController system, including user manuals, technical specifications, and maintenance guides.

title: Deploy and Maintain System
description: Deploy the NanoFactoryController system in the production environment, and establish processes for ongoing maintenance, updates, and support.
